      • prepareTemplateContext

        public void prepareTemplateContext(freemarker.template.SimpleHash context,
                          ForumContext jforumContext)
        Setup common variables used by almost all templates.
        Parameters:
        context - SimpleHash The context to use
        jforumContext - JForumContext

      • checkAutoLogin

        protected boolean checkAutoLogin(UserSession userSession)
        Checks user credentials / automatic login.
        Parameters:
        userSession - The UserSession instance associated to the user's session
        Returns:
        true if auto login was enabled and the user was sucessfuly logged in.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException

      • configureUserSession

        protected void configureUserSession(UserSession userSession,
                        User user)
        Setup optios and values for the user's session if authentication was ok.
        Parameters:
        userSession - The UserSession instance of the user
        user - The User instance of the authenticated user

      • checkSSO

        protected void checkSSO(UserSession userSession)
        Checks for user authentication using some SSO implementation
        Parameters:
        userSession - UserSession

      • refreshSession

        public void refreshSession()
        Do a refresh in the user's session. This method will update the last visit time for the current user, as well checking for authentication if the session is new or the SSO user has changed

      • getCookie

        public static javax.servlet.http.Cookie getCookie(String name)
        Gets a cookie by its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The cookie name to retrieve
        Returns:
        The Cookie object if found, or null oterwhise

      • getCookieTemplate

        protected javax.servlet.http.Cookie getCookieTemplate(String name)
        Template method to get a cookie. Useful to situations when a subclass wants to have a different way to retrieve a cookie.
        Parameters:
        name - The cookie name to retrieve
        Returns:
        The Cookie object if found, or null otherwise
        See Also:
        getCookie(String)

      • addCookie

        public static void addCookie(String name,
             String value)
        Add or update a cookie. This method adds a cookie, serializing its value using XML.
        Parameters:
        name - The cookie name.
        value - The cookie value

      • addCookieTemplate

        protected void addCookieTemplate(String name,
                     String value)
        Template method to add a cookie. Useful to suatins when a subclass wants to add a cookie in a fashion different than the normal behaviour
        Parameters:
        name - The cookie name
        value - The cookie value
        See Also:
        addCookie(String, String)
